article.title: Harris Wins Managed IT Security Contract For Air Force National Guard Network, Regional Operations And Security Centers
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Harris Corporation has been awarded a five-year, $26 million contract to provide managed information technology (IT) solutions to the Air National Guard Network and regional operations and security centers. Under the contract, the company will provide Tier III support for all facets of the enterprise IT system such as applications, infrastructure, vulnerability assessment, directory services, boundary protection and messaging.
